Tshanda Sangwa (a mụrụ na 26 Julaị 1996) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eti egwu na Switzerland-Congo.
A mụrụ Sangwa na Geneva n'afọ 1996

Nne na nna ya bụ ndị na-agụ egwú: nna ya Maray bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-agba egwú na Papa Wemba's orchestra, nne ya Sonia, bụ onye nkuzi egwu na Switzerland. O kwuru na o nweghị nrụgide ezinụlọ ọ bụla iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu.
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2001, ọ pụtara na azụmahịa "Bébé Rico" na-akpọsa ngwaahịa ntecha ụmụaka
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọha na eze maara ya n'okpuru aha "Baby Tshanda"
Maka  egwu mbụ ya n'ọnwa June afọ 2002, mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, Sangwa rụrụ ọrụ na Halle de la Gombe na Kinshasa n'ihu ndị nkiri 50,000
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2002, European Foundation for the Rights of the Child họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya maka ikike nke nwatakịrị.
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2003, Sangwa rụrụ ọrụ na 4th Pan-African Music Festival (FESPAM) na Brazzaville, ya na Youssou N'Dour, Manu Dibango, Magic System, na Koffi Olomide na-ekere òkè n'ọkwa
Maka ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2004, ọ rụrụ Little Prince na ihe nkiri Mwezé Ngangura Les Habits Neufs du Gouverneur
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2006, Sangwa jere ozi dịka onye nduzi maka "obere zebras" na Kinshasa: mmemme nke Swiss Romande Radio
E mere ihe ndekọ ahụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche ma nwee ikike nke nwatakịrị dịka isiokwu ha
Ihe omume ahụ meriri ihe nrite na Switzerland, "obere zebras" nwekwara ike isonye na nnukwu asọmpi redio mba ụwa maka ikike nwata na Egypt.
Mgbe nne na nna ya kewara n'afọ 2008, Sangwa na nne ya kwagara Switzerland
N'afọ 2011, o sonyere na mmemme Die grössten Schweizer Talente na SF1
Sangwa mechara lekwasị anya na ọmụmụ ihe ya ma kwụsị ọrụ egwu ya
O weputara abọm, Yele, n'ọnwa June afọ 2019.
